cp_000000.title: System Architecture Review
cp_000000.description: Review the proposed microservices architecture for the e-commerce platform
cp_000000.ai_reasoning: Microservices architecture provides better scalability, maintainability, and team autonomy. Each service can be developed and deployed independently.
cp_000000.human_feedback: Architecture looks solid. Good choice of technologies and service separation.

cp_000001.title: Security Implementation Review
cp_000001.description: Review security measures for user authentication and data protection
cp_000001.ai_reasoning: Comprehensive security implementation following OWASP guidelines with industry-standard encryption and authentication methods.
